column4: Accessible Blockly
column5: Keystrokes

column2: Item to be tested
column3: Pre-conditions
column4: Test Description (steps)
column5: Expected Outcome

column2: All hotkeys register
column3: None
column4: 1. Press each key to make sure it registers in console (each key has a console.log, when those are removed this test doesn’t apply)
column5: Each key press is registered

column2: Hotkeys disabled when typing
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. A block with a text field is currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Enter a text field in a block
2. Try to type, no hotkeys should register
column5: No hotkeys activate when typing

column2: Ctrl-z undos last action
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block
2. Delete the block
3. Press Ctrl-Z
column5: Block should reappear in the same place as before it was deleted

column2: Ctrl-y redos the last undo
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block
2. Delete the block
3. Press Ctrl-Z
4. Press Ctrl-Y
column5: Block should be deleted after reappearing

column2: User knows where they are on the page
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4: 1. Blocks are labeled appropriately and it is easy to tell where you are by labels
column5: Navigation through blocks is intuitive

column2: You can navigate through code using hotkeys
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block
2. Use controls to go in and out layers as well as up and down containers in addition to accessing fields inside blocks
column5: All blocks are accessible

column2: Search function to navigate quickly through code
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Press key to activate search function
2. Type block or comment id
3. Press Enter
column5: The block or comment you wanted to go to should be selected

column2: Comments are displayed
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks that have comments are currently in the workspace
column4: 1. There is a comments section visible
column5: Comments are displayed on the screen in readable fashion and are accurately mappable

column2: Can access menu to add blocks
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
column4:
1. Click or press hotkey to open menu
2. Select block that you want
column5: Block is added and there are no issues with the menu

column2: Hotkeys within menus work
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
column4:
1. Open menu
2. Press hotkeys to select category
3. Press hotkey to select block
column5: Block is added to the workspace

column2: Blocks are added in right place
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. Blocks are in the workspace
column4:
1. Select space that you want the block to be placed
2. Open menu
3. Press hotkeys to select category
4. Press hotkey to select block
column5: Block is added to the workspace in the space that was selected

column2: Hotkeys not applicable to menus are disabled within menu
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
column4:
1. Enter menu
2. Try hotkeys that are not applicable to menu
column5: Hotkeys should not cause anything in the scene to happen if they are not applicable to menu

column2: Can use hotkeys to add blocks within blocks
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. Blocks with block spaces inside them are held within the workspace
column4:
1. Select space within block that you want the block to be placed
2. Open menu
3. Press hotkeys to select category
4. Press hotkey to select block
column5: Block is added inside other block

column2: Can select empty spaces
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. Blocks with block spaces inside them are held within the workspace
column4: 1. Press hotkeys to navigate to a white space inside block
column5: White space is highlighted

column2: Can jump to the top of a section
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Click on a block in the middle of a section
2. Press hotkey to jump to top of section
column5: Block at top of section is highlighted

column2: Can jump to the bottom of the section
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Click on a block in the middle of a section
2. Press hotkey to jump to bottom of section
column5: Block at bottom of section is highlighted

column2: Can jump to the first block of a container
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Press button to open navigation 
2. Type id of container
3. Press Enter
column5: Block at top of the container is highlighted

column2: Can traverse in, out, up, down
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4: 1. Press hotkeys to navigate through blocks
column5: It is possible to navigate through layers as well as up and down on the same layer

column2: Shift Comma and Shift Period traverse within blocks
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. Blocks with fields inside them are held within the workspace
column4: 1. Press Shift Comma to go from selecting the block to first field, Shift period goes backwards
column5: Can access all fields within blocks

column2: Tab shift goes up a level
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block in the middle of a section
2. Press Tab Shift
column5: Selection moves from block selected to the one above it in the same layer

column2: Tab goes down a level
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block in the middle of a section
2. Press Tab
column5: Selection moves from block selected to the one below it in the same layer

column2: Comma and Period go within levels
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Blocks are currently in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block in the middle of a section
2. Press Comma
3. Press Period
column5: Selection moves from block selected to one next to it down a layer and then back

column2: Escape leaves menus or editing fields
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
column4:
1. Open menu
2. Press Escape key
column5: Menu is exited and previous selection (if applicable) is rehighlighted

column2: A initiates menu mode
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
column4: 1. Press A
column5: Menu is opened

column2: C makes a comment
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. There are blocks in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block
2. Press C
3. Type comment
4. Press enter
column5: Comment should be added to the block

column2: E enables editing of a field
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. There are blocks with fields in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block
2. Select a field within the block
3. Press E
4. Change field
5. Press Enter
column5: Field is changed properly

column2: G goes between a block and its comment
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. There are comments in the system
4. There are blocks in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block that has a comment
2. Press G
3. Press G again
column5: Should switch to comment and then back to the block

column2: N initiates search function
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. There are blocks in the workspace
column4:
1. Press N
2. Type id of object you want to move to
3. Press Enter
column5: Object that you wanted to move to is selected

column2: R goes to top of code
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. There are blocks in the workspace
column4:
1. Select a block in the middle of a section
2. Press R
column5: Block at the top of the section is selected

column2: 1-7 work to select category within A menu
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. Menu can be opened
column4:
1. Press A
2. Press any number 1-7
column5: Category that should be selected from 1-7 was selected

column2: A-Z work to select block within A menu
column3:
1. Workspace is active
2. Toolbox is active
3. Previous menu hotkeys work
column4:
1. Press A
2. Press any number 1-7
3. Press A-Z (up to # of blocks available)
column5: Block that you want should be selected and added to the workspace appropriately
